titles.title: A bill to remove restrictions from a parcel of land situated in the Atlantic District, Accomack County, Virginia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 3/20/2012--Introduced. Instructs the Secretary of the Interior, within 90 days of enactment of this Act, to remove all deed restrictions, including easements and covenants, described in a specified quitclaim deed from the United States to Accomack County, Virginia, relating to a parcel of land consisting of approximately 31.6 acres situated in the Atlantic District of the county.
